price: Na miji hiyo tuliwaangamiza watu wake walipo dhulumu. Na tukawawekea miadi ya maangamizo yao.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَعَلۡنَا لِمَهۡلِكِهِم مَّوۡعِدٗا
footnotes: Na hii basi ndio miji ya kale tuliyo iteketeza pale watu wao walipo dhulumu kwa kuwakanusha Mitume wao. Na Sisi tukawawekea miadi ya kuwaangamiza isiyo na khitilafu. Hali kadhaalika itakuwa ya hao katika kaumu yako wanao kanusha, ikiwa hawaamini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-qurā ahlaknāhum lammā ẓalamū wajaʿalnā limahlikihim mawʿidan
